name: Organ Trafficking
description:
Organ Trafficking

This game is a 2d game where you buy harvested organs for patients.

The way you get an organ is by finishing a minigame or reaching a certain goal.

Auto Saves

The game will save automatically to a save.json file, you can reset your

save data by selecting the "reset save" option in the settings menu.

Source Code

Its up on github and includes paint.net files for the animations :

https://github.com/ToasterPNG/Organ-Trafficking
